card.name: Shinpas, Calming Judgment Bond / Justice Shaper

property.name: Name1
property.value: Shinpas, Calming Judgment Bond

property.name: Name2
property.value: Justice Shaper

property.name: Type
property.value: Neo Creature/Spell

property.name: Type1
property.value: Neo Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SYMPATHY}: Creature (This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your creatures in the battle zone. It can't cost 0 or less.) {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Light creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} TWINPACT ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all light cards from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules1
Rules2
property.value: ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all light cards from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.value: {SYMPATHY}: Creature (This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your creatures in the battle zone. It can't cost 0 or less.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, gacharange summon. ({GACHARANGE SUMMON}: Summon the top card of your super gacharange with its cost paid.) ■ Each of your gacharange creatures gets "blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, gacharange summon. ({GACHARANGE SUMMON}: Summon the top card of your super gacharange with its cost paid.) TWINPACT ■ Return one of your opponent's creatures that has 5000 power or less to it's owner's hand.

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-10 Super GR Start Deck: Kira's Ghiramillion Galaxy

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your creatures in the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-10 Super GR Start Deck: Kira's Ghiramillion Galaxy

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may tap one of your creatures. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. ■ You may untap this creature to change your opponent's creature's attack to this creature or one of your tapped creatures.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may tap one of your creatures. If you do, draw a card. ■ You may untap this creature to change your opponent's creatures attack to this creature or one of your tapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. ■ If you have 2 or less other creatures in the battle zone, this creature can't untap. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, gacharange summon. ({GACHARANGE SUMMON}: Summon the top card of your super gacharange with its cost paid.)

property.name: Set

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ You may tap any number of your creatures. ■ Draw a card for each of your tapped creatures.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following. ► Draw 2 cards: ► Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. Until the start of your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block.
